column4: does anyone know what the codec packs are that pop up when you first try to play a unsupported audio/video file are? usually when you try to play a unsupported file you'll get a prompt saying its so and offer to check for the codec, i cant remember what they were
i was trying to figure it out as i let it install some codecs for me in before i upgraded to 8.04, now they arent working in all players
